summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CompTIA Security+ study app. Backend APIs working excellently (94.4% success rate). Frontend UI loads correctly but has critical navigation issue preventing access to study modes.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

critical_bugs.issue: Practice, Exam Sim, and Flashcards cards redirect to landing page instead of their respective routes
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Users cannot access core study functionality

integration_issues.issue: Dashboard cards not properly routing to study pages

passed_tests: Frontend dashboard loading with progress stats
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix dashboard study mode navigation. The Practice, Exam Simulation, and Flashcard cards on the dashboard are not properly routing to their respective pages (/practice, /exam, /flashcards). Instead, they redirect users back to the landing page, preventing access to core study functionality. Check React Router configuration and card click handlers.
